title: Getting Started with MERN Stack
content: The MERN stack consists of MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. It's a powerful combination for full-stack web development.
author: Sabari Raj

title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
content: Closures allow a function to access variables from an enclosing scope, even after that scope has closed.
author: Thamizh Arasan. JS

title: Why You Should Learn MongoDB
content: MongoDB is a NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents. It's ideal for modern applications.
author: Jeeva
